Uses of Interface
net.objectzoo.delegates.ActionAsync

  • Packages that use ActionAsync 
    Package Description
    net.objectzoo.delegates
    This package contains the delegates of the Events4J API.
    net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters
    This package contains support classes that can be used to wrap standard delegates to be asynchronous.
    net.objectzoo.delegates.impl
    This package contains support classes that can be used to implement AsyndAction or AsyncFunction delegates.
    net.objectzoo.events.impl
    This package contains support classes that implement EventDelegates ready to be used.

    • Uses of ActionAsync in net.objectzoo.delegates

      Methods in net.objectzoo.delegates that return ActionAsync 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> ActionAsync<T> ActionAsync.from(java.util.function.Consumer<T> action)
      Converts the given Consumer to the interface ActionAsync using the default executor.
      static <T> ActionAsync<T> ActionAsync.from(java.util.function.Consumer<T> action, java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
      Converts the given Consumer to the interface ActionAsync and executes asynchronous call using the given Executor.

    • Uses of ActionAsync in net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters

      Classes in net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters that implement ActionAsync 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActionToActionAsync<T>
      An adapter that converts a conventional Action or Consumer to an ActionAsync.

    • Uses of ActionAsync in net.objectzoo.delegates.impl

      Classes in net.objectzoo.delegates.impl that implement ActionAsync 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActionAsyncSupport<T>
      This is an abstract support class that can be used to quickly implement asynchronous actions.

    • Uses of ActionAsync in net.objectzoo.events.impl

      Subinterfaces of ActionAsync in net.objectzoo.events.impl 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EventAsyncDelegate<T>
      An EventAsyncDelegate implements ActionAsync as well as EventDelegate and is meant as a specification for implementations that delegate calls to the ActionAsync interface asynchronously to all subscribers of the EventDelegate interface.
      Classes in net.objectzoo.events.impl that implement ActionAsync 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EventAsyncAdapter<T>
      The EventAsyncAdapter is class that adapts an EventDelegate to EventAsyncDelegate so that the original delegates subscribers can be invoked asynchronously.
